BRIAN LAWRENCE DICKSON S o f t w a r e   D e v e l o p e r

EDUCATION

Bachelors degree in Fine Art from Glasgow School of Art.

Specialised in Sculpture and Environmental Art.

WORK

Gained Celta qualification to teach English as a foreign language.

Lived and worked as an English teacher in Budapest, Hungary.

Specialised in Business English to adults.

PERSONAL

I run a sustainability / art project called The Coorie Project.

This utilises all my skills as a photograper, designer and screenprinter.

RETRAINED

I decided to combine my visual arts background with a career in tech.

I completed Codeclan's Professional Software Development course in March 2023.

Gained a SCQF Level award in Software Development.

C o o r i e   P r o j e c t

A site built with Javascript, React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my personal sustainability / art passion project.

The Coorie Project hopes to hightight the beauty of the natural world in Scotland and raise funds to support other artists wih work pertaining to climate change.

The Coorie Project is the first project I undertook after graduating from Codeclan. One of the reasons I wanted to learn how to code was to no longer have to rely on Squarespace for my online output. As a way of learning, I wanted to replicate a Squarespace style accurately but bring my own visual interests like parallax into it.

Visit Site Github Repo
N o m   N o m

My capstone project from Codeclan, built with three other students over two weeks. An application that aims to make cooking a fun activity between a parent and child.

Made using JavaScript, Java (Spring), React and Tailwind CSS.

The app engages children in the joys of cooking with parent, teaching the basics of food preparation and nutrition. The app allows log in for users to access more features while non logged in users can stil l access full recipe list. Users can create, save, edit and delete a recipe.

Github Repo
. s e l f

My first group project at codeclan built with three pre-assigned students. Built using Javascript, React, Charts.js and MongoDB

A React App created to give future Codeclan students a place to log their thoughts and feelings during their study. Users have the ability to log journal entries, keep track of diet, sleep, downtime. The application logs this data then displays it in charts and graphs. The application also has a database of suggestions and tips for improving on any aspects they may be lacking.

Github Repo Video run-through
T i e   O n e   O n

A CRUD cocktail recipe application built by myself using Python and Flask over the course of a week.

Tie One On was my first project during Codeclan. I wanted to build a cocktail reciper generator so I could showcase my favourtite cocktails to friends and family. The result is a fully functioning CRUD app where the user can browse a list of cocktails, see an individual cocktail, have a random cocktail suggested and add an ingredient or a full cocktail recipe to the database.

Github Repo
